item.title: Unbranded Admin Panel
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Impress your clients

Were trying to improve our add-ons in both usability and styling s. Thats weve decided to keep on working on the themes option panel until we have the perfect panel build in for youll. In Majestics weve made the panel even more usable then before and removed the clutter. Its still unbranded so you dont have to worry about one of your clients to see your using a third party developer. In the new panel there have been a from builder, a font manager and a sidebar manager built in. Majestics has even more things to play with then our previous released themes and were almost at a point that you wont need anymore plug-ins.

item.title: Custom Widgets
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
12 Custom Widgets to be exact!

Majestics has 16 custom widgets, an advertising widget, Twitter widget, Facebook widget, popular posts widget, contact from widget, flickr widget and many many more. [one_fourth]
  • 125x125 Ads
  • 300x250 Ads
  • Latest Tweets
  • Google Map
[/one_fourth] [one_fourth]
  • Facebook Like
  • Flickr Widget
  • Video Widget
  • Contact Form
[/one_fourth] [one_fourth_last]
  • Portfolio Showcase
  • Custom Box
  • Contact Form
  • Featured Posts
[/one_fourth_last]

item.title: Custom Form Builder
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Custom forms in a snap

Compose your own forms from now on. Yes, you heard us right. We have a custom form composer build for you. Packed with drag and drop functionality, notification support, captcha, auto responder and much more. Available elements are Text fields, Text areas, Drop downs, Notification, Captcha and Auto respond. To edit your messages you have to head up to the Message section where you can ad your own text for the Auto respond and Notification. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. item.title: Slider Manager
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Manage your front page slider with style.

Majestics has a cool slider manager from where you can insert your images, just upload them, give it a title and description and let it point anywhere you want. Want to change the order of the images, then theres no need to delete and start over. The slider items can be dragged to the place you want them to show, how cool is that.

item.title: Awesome Portfolio
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A great looking Portfolio structure

With Majestics we created a very good looking and extremely easy to use portfolio section which is fully manageable through it's own manager and with some additional options editable inside the option panel. item.title: Unlimited Sidebars
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Create as many sidebars as you need!

Yes that's correct, you no longer have to stay with just one or two sidebars for all your pages and posts. Your now able to create as many sidebars as you need. Creating them and assigning them to a certain page has never been this easy. Just another reason to buy this theme and make your work a little easier.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[one_fourth]

Visual Composer inside!

We can offer you any style you need with our inbuilt visual style editor, no need to open up any css file anymore. Watch the video for more info. [/one_fourth] [one_fourth]

Need unlimited Sidebars?

Want a different sidebar for each page? That's no problem, with our inbuilt sidebar manager your able to create as many sidebars as you need. [/one_fourth] [one_fourth]

Create your forms in style?

Never look for another contact form plugin ever again, we have the ultimate solution for you. Create almost any type of form with our inbuilt form manager. [/one_fourth] [one_fourth]

Powerful Shortcode Editor!

Ever wanted to create your own page templates filled with the coolest short-codes without opening your ftp application, WordPress Editor or code editor. [/one_fourth]

wp:comment.wp:comment_author: Archin – Premium WordPress Business Theme · Wordpress Stock

item.title: Font Manager
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Add any font you like!

Theres no need to to ask for help with adding custom font anymore, we have build a Font Manager for youll. Ad fonts through this manager which will be added in to the already existing list of fonts. Works like a charm, only thing you need to pay attention to is the font sizes but we have thought about that as well. Font sizes can be changed also in the option panel. Watch the video inside the documentation or on our video support site to see how it works. Then from within the option panel your able to ad as many fonts as you want by either adding cufon fonts inside the font manager or by adding the google web font name inside the option panel

item.title: Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
No need to remember any shortcode anymore

We've paid some extra attention to the short-codes this time and from now it as easy as it can be to ad your short-code. Inside the short-code editor there's also a Button editor which can create almost any type of button you want or need. Watch the screen-cast to get an idea of how it works and how to ad them.

item.title: Visual Editor
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Visual Composer inside!

We can offer you any style you need with our inbuilt visual style editor, no need to open up any css file anymore. This means if you only need to change font colors, link colors, button colors, title colors, footer background colors, footer textures, header background colors and header textures. For more then this then you still have to work inside the code but the basic color settings and background settings are covered.

item.title: General options
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Homepage Options
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Blog Options
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Inside this option panel you can change blog related items such as social settings, related posts, author activation and Twitter and Facebook settings.

item.title: Typography Options
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Media Options
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Visual Options
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: In the visual option tab your able to change background colors, textures, text colors, link colors, button colors. menu colors, and many many more.

item.title: Plus Options
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The Plus option is a addition were still working one but its ready for phase one. You can see it as some sort of appreciation. You can ad your purchase ID in here to enable all kind of options inside the option panel and to receive future update messages through this panel. In the nearest future we will provide many cool things through this. You can also enable or disable the custom scrollbar. You can export and import settings from previous set up and vice versa.

item.title: TitanEditor
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The shortcode editor on steroids

With TitanEditor your able to create as many page templates as you need and fill them with a visual short-code editor. Everything is taken care of, drag and drop functionality, delete page templates, ad page template, edit page templates. Add columns, message boxes, lists, accordions, tabbed containers, toggles, recent posts, quotes, videos, buttons with an button editor inside and much much more. And no worries if you don't want to ad shortcodes with the titan editor, there's also a basic shortcode editor. This way you've got TitanEditor for Page template editing and the basic shortcode editor for adding shortcodes in between your default pages and posts.

item.title: TitanInstaller
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
TitanInstaller, As advertised within a minute!

Install Sneak within a minute, this only with a few clicks. However this totally depends on your server setting and the correct permissions and your upload quota. It does take around 30 to 40 seconds to complete the media import process. All the things you need to know before you can start using this installer is very well explained inside the docs.

item.title: TitanPlus
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
WPTitans says thanks to our customers!

The Plus option is a addition were still working one but its ready for phase one. You can see it as some sort of appreciation. You can ad your purchase ID in here to enable all kind of options inside the option panel and to receive future update messages through this panel. In the nearest future we will provide many cool things through this. You can also enable or disable the custom scrollbar. You can export and import settings from previous set up and vice versa.
